hmm,  apparently for a while there my server was bouncing these messages.  
Anyway did i miss anything really important?  I'm mostly curious if the 
editor project is going anywhere or what.  Are people still making levels and 
want a better editor, or did that gridfile tool that deathifier wrote enough? 
 anyhow, it's turning out to be another semester with lots of stuff to do, 
but I did manage to aquire some more proggramming skills last semester.  

Bjorn
